page.title: 10High School Buildings.
page.content: We looked around the main building, the hall, the cloakroom and classrooms. There were four playgrounds, tennis courts, and a swimming pool. The swimming pool was in the open air but it looked very nice. There were two other main blocks, the Art block and the Maths and Science block built in the 1970's. There were two dining halls where the pupils serve themselves and can choose what they wish to eat. We cannot choose at our school and so I am looking forward to going to Harland Way. The school has a uniform which is mainly maroon and grey.
